object_description: A rectangular twisty puzzle with yellow and blue faces sitting on a wooden surface.

milestones.label: approach
milestones.description: The hand is positioned above the puzzle block.

milestones.label: grasp
milestones.description: Fingers make contact with the top layer of the puzzle.

milestones.label: rotate
milestones.description: The hand performs a quick flicking motion to rotate the top layer of the puzzle.

milestones.label: release
milestones.description: The hand releases contact with the puzzle.

milestones.label: retract
milestones.description: The hand moves slightly back to its starting position.
